name: Wooshii
description:
The Wooshii platform connects over 13000 video creators and production teams around the world. It helps them and Wooshii clients scale their video production output. The platform helps these teams

- Connect and find suppliers and work
- Manage files in the cloud
- Communicate through live chat
- Share and markup video files
- Manage tasks, schedules and budgets

team.title: CEO
team.name: Fergus Dyer-Smith
team.bioHtml: Founder @Wooshii, @Snowbombing • Studied at @University of Manchester, Father, Surfer

jobs.title: Business Development Executive
jobs.description:
Working with Global brands, you’ll be targeting senior decision makers within the travel and technology sectors, evangelising our video production solution, and building a pipeline of opportunities with the World’s leading brands.

Joining a small, ambitious team you will be equipped with a market leading proposition and a highly effective sales development process. We’re currently working with over 150 Global brands, and are looking for high performing individuals who can help propel us to our next phase of growth:

Key responsibilities and objectives –

– Build a multi £M pipeline of video production opportunities with Global travel and technology brands

– Engage with key decision makers, overcome objections and confirm discovery calls with the sales team.

– Obtain a monthly and quarterly individual pipeline and meetings quota in-line with business growth objectives.

The candidate –

– Smart, tenacious, and persistent – you’re comfortable in overcoming objections and goal orientated.

– Excellent written and verbal communication skills with the ability to engage with a sophisticated c-level audience.

– Highly organised and methodical in your approach, with the ability to ruthlessly prioritise your time.

– A fast learner who can quickly get up to speed with online tools such as SalesForce and Outreach.

– Ambitious, hunter mentality – you thrive off identifying and connecting with new prospects.

– Minimum 3 years experience in a quota attaining sales, or sales development role – ideally selling marketing solutions at an Enterprise level.

Remuneration

This is a junior to mid-level position offering a flexible remuneration package based upon experience. Remuneration will consist of a competitive basic salary and uncapped monthly bonus.

NOTE – We will only review applications that include a recent resume.

jobs.title: Business Development Manager
jobs.description:
Working with Global brands, you’ll be consulting c-level marketers on video strategy and helping them to implement a scalable approach to content creation. With the support of a sales development and prospecting team your diary will be filled with six and seven figure opportunities, and a market leading proposition to present.

Video production is £multi-billion global industry, and currently represents the fastest growing media format across all channels. Global brands are investing heavily in content creation, and traditional agencies simply cannot deliver in this demanding, price-sensitive market.

This role offers the successful candidate an opportunity to join a small, fast growing team where your impact will directly determine the success of the business, and pave the way for significant earning potential and career progression.

Requirements:

* Minimum 5 years quota carrying experience at Enterprise level
* Consistent high-performer who can verify past success
* A passion for video, and a desire to join an early stage company
* Strong, self-directed work ethic
* Exceptional communication and presentation skills
* Ambitious, driven and target oriented
* Prior media sales experienced desired although not essential

Remuneration

This is a mid-senior level position offering a flexible remuneration package based upon experience. Remuneration will consist of a competitive basic salary and performance related bonus. Uncapped OTE of £100k +

About WVA:

WVA has developed and uses technology that helps brands and production teams to create World class video content whilst allowing teams to scale in volume and geography. 

Clients include Google, Ebay, Amazon Web Services, Cheapflights.com, Hilton Hotels, Qatar Airways and many more. Visit https://wooshiivideoagency.com.

Perks:

WVA offer a fun, collaborative and supportive team environment. With offices in London Bridge we offer flexible working hours, remote working, un-tracked holidays, and an opportunity to progress within a successful, early-stage media company

jobs.title: Chief Technology Officer
jobs.description:
About Wooshii



Wooshii is a fast-growing company focused on helping the worlds largest brands scale video. We do this through three key routes. A globally connected network of 13,000 plus video teams, technology that allows us to run more efficient productions and in-house expertise. 


We treat all our team like adults. That means we focus on outputs, not inputs. We are not interested in how long you spend in the office, what time you come in, how much holiday you take. We care about the quality of the work. 


**The Role**


A hands-on CTO is required to help develop our web platform for video production project management build a team of developers drive new product development

Fresh off the back of a new round of funding we are looking to grow our team. We are looking to build a new product and development team and this is an ideal opportunity for you to help shape that team and our product direction.

This team may be built in the UK or remotely.

The candidate will be work directly with the CEO and responsible for executing plans, publishing new features/updates (build process).

We are looking for a hands-on CTO. One that can both lead, build and work as part of the development team.

Directly to help execute the product roadmap whilst also influencing its direction. 

But also hands-off - organising activities, building a new tech team and guiding it on a daily basis. 

Very good experience with all web technologies is a must as the role includes designing and planning of features from concept to implementation.



Experience with ;

Symfony2,
Vanilla
JavaScript
and cloud servers maintenance will be a bonus. 

The platform is a single-page JavaScript application acting as an interface to an API built with Symfony2 framework and making extensive use of AWS services. 

We are additionally looking to develop new products.

You will help us quickly bring MVP's to market so we can test a hypothesis. Successful products will then be developed and teams built around them.

For the right candidate, we offer

Competitive salary
Stock Options
Flexible working arrangements


We are HQ'd in London and have offices in Lithuania the US.

jobs.title: Team Lead Engineer
jobs.description:
A hands-on lead developer is required to help develop and maintain our web platform for video production project management.

The platform is a single page JavaScript application acting as an interface to an API built with Symfony2 framework and making extensive use of AWS services.

Very good experience with all web technologies is a must as the role includes designing and planning of features from concept to implementation. Experience with symfony2, vanilla JavaScript and cloud servers maintenance will be a bonus.

Part of the role will be organising activities, building a tech team and guiding it on a daily basis.

The candidate will be reporting directly to the CEO and responsible for executing plans, publishing new features/updates (build process). 

This is a great opportunity to help influence a product.
